title.narrative: Save the Children Mirpur earthquake response

description.narrative: The Mirpur Earthquake Response follows a request for assistance from the Chairman of the National Disaster Management Authority in response to an earthquake on 24th September 2019 in the Mirpur district of Azad Jammu and Kashmir, Pakistan. Australian assistance will support distribution of 830 winterized tents, prioritizing beneficiaries on the basis of needs. Vulnerable households will be targeted including those with; persons with disabilities, children under 5, elderly, chronically ill, pregnant and lactating women and those headed by women or orphans.
